question: who did puss in boots grew up with
api_result: In the "Shrek" film series and the "Puss in Boots" spin-off movie, Puss in Boots grew up in an orphanage in the town of San Ricardo. He was raised there along with his adoptive brother, Humpty Alexander Dumpty. The two shared a close bond during their childhood, dreaming of finding the magic beans that would lead them to the Golden Goose and bring them fortune and glory.
